name: Impossible Game 2017
description:
Impossible Game is impossible to beat! The hardest game ever!

After several months of users suggestions, we just lunched the impossible game, which is way harder then any of our other game.

Special thanks for David Alpha, for creating beautiful beats for our game. Music is created by this cool artist.

We have special graphics and special items for playing this game.

Features Included:

* 4 special and hardest tours
* checkpoints and hints
* several ways and different styles
* up and down tracks
